information: The company BRODERSEN & KÖVER GMBH, is a Service Provider, founded in 1961, which operates in the Vegetables, edible roots and tubers industry. It also operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry, Nurseries, Textile plants, and Public works contractors industries. It is based in Bremervörde, Germany.
